entries.description: Amazon Q: Updated status bar icons including an explicit icon for an unconnected state
Human in the loop - Adding human intervention to help update dependencies during the Amazon Q Transformation process
Improve the SSO login experience by switching to the Authorization Code with PKCE flow
Fix AWS SSO connection when authenticating with RDS using an IAM Identity Center profile (#4145)
Amazon Q: Reduce frequency of automated code scans and terminate superseded file scans.
Amazon Q Code Transformation: ensure chat does not freeze with /transform on an invalid project
Amazon Q: Fix issue where items listed by Amazon Q Code Scan were duplicated or missing
Amazon Q Chat: Typewriter animator parts showing up in code fields inside listitems
Removed install Q notification if Q is already installed
Amazon Q: Avoid duplicate credential expired notifications during startup
Amazon Q: Support disabling auto-scan for unsupported languages.
